required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 09, 2023
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Facial Cleanser
clinical_study.official_title: The Safety and Efficacy of Facial Cleanser Containing Combination of Olive Oil, Virgin Coconut Oil, Butylene Glycol and Hyaluronic Acid on Skin Hydration and Skin Elasticity

lead_sponsor.agency: Ungku Shahrin Medical Aesthetic Research & Innovation (USMARI) Centre

clinical_study.source: Ungku Shahrin Medical Aesthetic Research & Innovation (USMARI) Centre

brief_summary.textblock:
This study is conducted to evaluate the safety and effectiveness of facial cleanser X containing combination of olive oil, virgin coconut oil, butylene glycol and hyaluronic acid on skin hydration and skin elasticity. The study duration is 5 weeks and the skin assessment will be carried out at baseline, week 3 and week 5.The main questions this study aims to answer are:
1. The effect of product on skin hydration.
2. The effect of product on skin elasticity.
3. To observe any adverse effect occurrence with the usage of the product.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in skin hydration from baseline and at week 3 and 5 after using facial cleanser X
primary_outcome.description: Skin hydration will be assessed using JANUS III skin analyzer

primary_outcome.measure: Change in skin elasticity from baseline and at week 3 and 5 after using facial cleanser X
primary_outcome.description: Skin elasticity will be assessed using JANUS III skin analyzer

primary_outcome.measure: Adverse effect after using facial cleanser X
primary_outcome.description: Based on adverse effect occurrence on participants that occur during study period (5 weeks)

arm_group.description: Participants will used Product X facial cleanser twice daily for 5 weeks

intervention.description: Product X facial cleanser contain olive oil, virgin coconut oil, butylene glycol and hyaluronic acid

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Malaysia citizen
- Male and female (age 35-55 years old)
Exclusion Criteria:
- Participants who have acne which require medical treatment.
- Participants taking isotretinoin
- Participants who had undergo any cosmetic procedures such as laser & light treatment, botulinum toxin A injections and chemical peeling for the past 3 months
- Participants who are immunocompromised
- Participants with history of facial surgery

facility.name: Ungku Shahrin Medical Aesthetic Research & Innovation (USMARI) Centre
